resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The red dragon's head echoes the Devil's one.
resource.chars: The red dragon's head echoes the Devil's one.

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The Devil.This depiction of the Devil in front of the tree, and not the dragon, is found only in this manuscript.
resource.chars:
The Devil.
This depiction of the Devil in front of the tree, and not the dragon, is found only in this manuscript.
